code: @Override protected void encode(ChannelHandlerContext ctx, ByteBuf byteBuf, List<Object> out) throws Exception {     if (byteBuf.isReadable()) {         int length = byteBuf.readableBytes().         String headerString = length + " ".         ByteBuf header = ByteBufAllocator.DEFAULT.buffer(headerString.getBytes(Charset.forName("UTF8")).length).         header.writeBytes(headerString.getBytes(Charset.forName("UTF8"))).         Unpooled.buffer().         byteBuf.retain().         out.add(Unpooled.wrappedBuffer(header, byteBuf)).     } }
